mtas.analysis.util

Class MtasCharFilterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.AbstractAnalysisFactory
      • org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.CharFilterFactory
        • mtas.analysis.util.MtasCharFilterFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.ResourceLoaderAware

    public class MtasCharFilterFactory
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.CharFilterFactory
implements org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.ResourceLoaderAware
    A factory for creating MtasCharFilter objects.
